summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Board of Adjustment (Panel C) of the City of Dallas will convene on April 15, 2024, for a briefing at 10:30 A.M. followed by a public hearing at 1:00 P.M. The meeting will take place at Dallas City Hall, Room 6ES, and will also be accessible via videoconference. The purpose of the meeting is to address various zoning and adjustment requests from residents.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
The agenda includes a call to order, staff presentations, public hearings, and public testimony. Notably, the meeting will review minutes from the previous meeting and discuss a docket of cases, which includes uncontested items, holdover items, and individual cases.

**Important Details**:  
Significant proposals include several applications for special exceptions to fence height and opacity regulations, as well as requests for variances related to side-yard setbacks and off-street parking. Specific cases include applications from Rotem Fartook, Rob Baldwin, Sachin Patel, Jonathan Martinez, and Audra Buckley.

**Action Items**:  
The Board is expected to approve the minutes from the March 18, 2024 meeting and make decisions on the various zoning requests presented during the public hearing. Individuals wishing to speak must register by April 14, 2024, to ensure their participation.
